name: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON SENTIMENTAL ANALYSIS AND DEEP LEARNING
content: International Conference on Sentimental Analysis and Deep Learning (ICSADL 2020) is a prominent event organized with the motivation for providing an international forum for all researchers, academicians and students for sharing their research findings on the different facets of Deep Learning and Sentimental Analysis techniques. ICSADL 2020 is held on 2-3, April 2020, in KGiSL Institute of Technology, Coimbatore, India. ICSADL 2020 aims to exchange and share new ideas and research results about all aspects of Sentimental analysis and deep learning which includes Artificial Intelligence, Innovations in robotics, Big Data and also converse the practical challenges encountered and the solutions adopted. ICSADL 2020 will highlight the areas of Statistical Learning Methods, Applied Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Cognitive Computing.
